614230.name: Rhythm Rush Demo
614230.description:
FULL GAME:

Description!
In this demo, you can play on the first three different difficulties with three set songs on any of the game modes! Buy the full game at its low price to unlock many other features!

Three Game Modes To Play!
Play "FOLLOW" to follow a line that fluctuates with the song while dodging objects spawning with the beat of the song!
Play the classic mode "DODGE" and dodge obstacles that spawn with the beat of the song!
Play "FIGHT" to follow the line and kill waves of enemies that spawn with the beat of the song!
